item.title: A Framework for the Mind
item.description: Disclaimer: This post is not for you if you disagree with the following statement: Human brain is simply the greatest intellectual quest of all time. Introduction Before setting out on this quest, let’s pause to consider our end goal and direction. How do we understand the brain, and what makes for a good explanation? The answer that often comes to mind might sound like this: …so surely the answer to how this thing works is going to have to be at the level of neurons and synapses, right?
